scripts.avatar: cd projects/ngx-avatar && bump --patch && cd ../../ && ng build ngx-avatar && cd dist/ngx-avatar && npm publish --access=public
scripts.flatpickr: cd projects/ngx-flatpickr && bump --patch && cd ../../ && ng build ngx-flatpickr && cd dist/ngx-flatpickr && npm publish --access=public
scripts.editor: cd projects/ngx-mat-editor && bump --patch && cd ../../ && ng build ngx-mat-editor && cd dist/ngx-mat-editor && npm publish --access=public
scripts.select: cd projects/ngx-mat-select && bump --patch && cd ../../ && ng build ngx-mat-select && cd dist/ngx-mat-select && npm publish --access=public
scripts.rights: cd projects/ngx-rights && bump --patch && cd ../../ && ng build ngx-rights && cd dist/ngx-rights && npm publish --access=public
scripts.roles: cd projects/ngx-roles && bump --patch && cd ../../ && ng build ngx-roles && cd dist/ngx-roles && npm publish --access=public
scripts.timepicker: cd projects/ngx-timepicker && bump --patch && cd ../../ && ng build ngx-timepicker && cd dist/ngx-timepicker && npm publish --access=public
scripts.script-loader: cd projects/ngx-script-loader && bump --patch && cd ../../ && ng build ngx-script-loader && cd dist/ngx-script-loader && npm publish --access=public
scripts.publish: npm-run-all avatar flatpickr editor select rights roles timepicker script-loader --parallel
